Articles.Content:
So, I thought I might introduce myself. My name is Jack Raiden(Anonymously). It's Japanese for "Thunder And Lightning". It describes my personality, pretty much. Fast, and with one strike. I am an administrator on the extremely popular Garry's Mod DarkRP server KDGaming(server #1). It was a long journey to administrator, but I made it after a lot of hard work.

I started playing KSP a while ago. I saw jacksepticeye play it and I was mind-blown. I wanted a game like this when I was 5 but I bought it, version 0.23.5 and had a lot of fun. I then got bored, and found out about MODS! :DDDD so then I started experimenting with so much stuff, and was amazed by the community's insight. I mean, theoretically, I thought of an inertial fusion engine, but it's pretty cool to see it in action. The factor of neutron radiation was factored in as well, and I was amazed. This was only the interstellar one, and the surface was unscratched.

I never updated because I never felt like it. Couldn't be bothered re-installing my addons(when I got more). But then, just this Christmas, I decided to buy 0.90 because it was in the sale. I was yet again, amazed. I soon, again, got a bit bored and thus downloaded mods. These just frustrated me but when I got them to work I had a lot of fun. And that's the story so far.

If you want to join KDGaming, check out THIS link to the website/forums. HERE is my forum account. Feel free to add me if you join. Until then, see you around

Welcome Raiden!

Hello, MrWalrus. Are you related to Jamie Hyneman from mythbusters?
No, but I am part of a secret organization of walruses trying to take over the world, tell no one!
